name: Albaricoque
description: El albaricoquero da frutos a finales de primavera y durante todo el verano. El albaricoque no soporta larga conservación porque sigue madurando una vez cosechado (se dice de estos frutos que son climatéricos). Cuando viene de lejos, puedes estar seguro que habrá sido recolectado antes de estar maduro.
description_cat: The apricot tree bears fruit in late spring and throughout the summer. The apricot does not support long conservation because it continues to ripen once harvested. When it comes from afar, you can be sure that it will have been collected before it was ready.
description_en: The apricot tree bears fruit in late spring and throughout the summer. The apricot does not support long conservation because it continues to ripen once harvested. When it comes from afar, you can be sure that it will have been collected before it was ready.
